message.body: Hi love, happy new year! Any interest in yoga and/or dinner this week?
Happy new year!!! This week is a little crazy but could you do next Tuesday?
Yes next Tuesday works for me! :-)
Ugh I literally just got told that I have to do a work event on the 15th. Could you do Thursday the 17th? So sorry!
Haha no worries at all! I can def do the 17th!
grab a quick bite at Cava or something? I'd love to catch up with you!
Perfect! So sorry! Can't wait to see you! There's a class at 5:45p or 6:15p. Which one works better for you? If time permits, perhaps the 5:45p and then
Yes that sounds lovely! And you have nothing to be sorry about! :-) I would say let's aim for the 5:45 and then hop down to cava if that works out timingwise!
